DataSourcePortable.Name: K_CRM_MEDIA_VISITA_ANUAL_GESTOR_COMERCIAL
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(*) MEDIAVISANUAL
FROM K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO A
INNER JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAS B ON A.PESSOA = B.HANDLE
WHERE YEAR(A.DATACONCLUSAO) = YEAR(GETDATE())
AND B.FASE NOT IN (1,6)
AND A.RESPOSTA NOT IN (75)
AND B.FILIAL = @FILIAL
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="MEDIAVISANUAL" From="A" Path="MEDIAVISANUAL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
